summary: Completed comprehensive frontend and backend testing of Seller Product Performance & Analytics feature. All 14 API tests passed. Frontend UI verified on desktop and mobile.

issues: The metrics grid shows views/saves/chats but is missing 'offers' metric card - currently showing 4 cards instead of 5 as mentioned in requirements. The 'offers_received' data is available in API but not displayed separately.

critical_code_review_comments: Performance button correctly uses stats-chart icon with blue background (#E3F2FD) to distinguish from other actions
SimpleBarChart component works as replacement for victory-native (web compatibility fix)
AI insights working with real GPT-5.2 via emergent LLM key - shows 'AI' badge
Period selector (24h, 7d, 30d) correctly changes active state
Location breakdown displays correctly showing 'New York - 5 views'
Boost CTA at bottom is prominent and links to /boost/{listing_id}
Mobile responsive layout works correctly - buttons stack vertically
seed_data_creation: Used existing test listing: 5375f0a3-e119-4e70-9b80-8214c61f7d64 (Test Laptop for Analytics)
context_for_next_testing_agent: Performance analytics feature fully functional. Test credentials: seller@test.com/test1234. Test listing ID: 5375f0a3-e119-4e70-9b80-8214c61f7d64.

features_verified.My Listings Performance Button: VERIFIED - Blue stats-chart icon button visible for active listings on both desktop (DesktopListingCard) and mobile (ListingItem) views
features_verified.Navigation to /performance/[listing_id]: VERIFIED - Clicking performance button navigates to /performance/5375f0a3-e119-4e70-9b80-8214c61f7d64
features_verified.Performance Screen Loading State: VERIFIED - Shows ActivityIndicator with 'Loading analytics...' text
features_verified.Metrics Grid (views, saves, chats): VERIFIED - Displays Total Views (5), Unique Views (5), Saves (1), Chats (1)
features_verified.Period Selector (24h, 7d, 30d): VERIFIED - Three buttons, 7 Days selected by default with green background
features_verified.Views Trend Chart: VERIFIED - SimpleBarChart showing daily trend data
features_verified.AI Insights Section: VERIFIED - Shows AI-generated insights with AI badge, rule-based suggestions with action buttons
features_verified.Boost This Listing CTA: VERIFIED - Green CTA at bottom with rocket icon
features_verified.GET /api/analytics/listing/{id}: VERIFIED - Returns metrics with all required fields
